name: Waking Up: Way Back Home
description:
When Earth became an uninhabitable place, humans were forced to live in space. Captain Urus Kramp, governor of the mothership Babylon 3, founded a new civilization and organized intergalactic exploration missions alongside Sub-Officer Leonard Thoran. Years later, Roby, Leonard's son, leaves Babylon 3 and infiltrates a ship heading to an unknown planet where he believes his father is located. Face danger with Roby and join him on his epic mission to uncover what's happening with Captain Urus Kramp and Babylon 3. Will he unveil the mystery, find his father, and return home? His destiny is in your hands.

Key features:

  • Third-person adventure.
  • Immersive story.
  • Atmospheric scenarios.
  • Puzzle solving.
  • Relaxing gameplay.
  • Decision making.
  • Exploration and secrets.
  • Alternate endings.
